title: Sun Sentinel
summary: A simple, elegant, customizable way to get our exclusive, premium storytelling.
description: FEATURES:â€¢ Get Florida news, politics, sports, business, entertainment as it happensâ€¢ Keep up with the ever-changing Florida dining and nightlife sceneâ€¢ Enjoy exclusive videos and photo galleriesâ€¢ Create your own personalized news feed with One-Tap Followingâ€¢ Edit the section list to be in your preferred orderâ€¢ Save must-read stories, photos and videos for when you have the time to enjoy themâ€¢ Keep track of what you've read and what you haven't with Progress Reportâ€¢ Turn your device sideways for an entirely different visual view of the newsâ€¢ Get the latest breaking news from our newsroom in your notificationsâ€¢ Share stories easily with Twitter, Facebook or email.
descriptionHTML:
FEATURES:
• Get Florida news, politics, sports, business, entertainment as it happens
• Keep up with the ever-changing Florida dining and nightlife scene
• Enjoy exclusive videos and photo galleries
• Create your own personalized news feed with One-Tap Following
• Edit the section list to be in your preferred order
• Save must-read stories, photos and videos for when you have the time to enjoy them
• Keep track of what you've read and what you haven't with Progress Report
• Turn your device sideways for an entirely different visual view of the news
• Get the latest breaking news from our newsroom in your notifications
• Share stories easily with Twitter, Facebook or email.
comments: Worked will for me don't become stagnant keep improving! ðŸ˜‰
Fixed some errors, still needs a lot of work
Alerts were sent in notifications. Articles load fine to read, goes back to home page to view other news. Nice.
Articles are slow to load. They sold look at NY Times or Wall St Journal apps, where full stories load on each screen. Sun sentinel gives a snippet, and full story may never appear. Useless app.
The videos don't play, only audio works and the scroll is terrible. Prolly gonna cancel this subscription.
